product.longDescription: Darker green, and more upright growth habit, than previous Green Oakleaf, making it less sensitive to bottom rot. Compact heads are great for selling as a whole head or in salad mix. Pair with either a red, core-type oak or red, core-type butter. High resistance to downy mildew races EU 16–37, US 5–9 and Nasonovia ribisnigri aphid. Pelleted seed. Avg. 760 seeds/oz. Packet: 25 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Exclusive! Fine-lobed saladbowl-type oakleaf. Conventional seed with NOP-compliant pelleting.

attributes.label: Grid Description
value: Condensed saladbowl-type oakleaf for whole heads or salad mixes.
val: Condensed saladbowl-type oakleaf for whole heads or salad mixes.

attributes.label: Product Feature Additional
value: Recommended Summer Planting for Fall Harvest

Salanova® Green Oakleaf Pelleted Lettuce Seed

Product ID:3058JP.113058JP

Darker green, and more upright growth habit, than previous Green Oakleaf, making it less sensitive to bottom rot. Compact heads are great for selling as a whole head or in salad mix. Pair with either a red, core-type oak or red, core-type butter. High resistance to downy mildew races EU 16–37, US 5–9 and Nasonovia ribisnigri aphid. Pelleted seed. Avg. 760 seeds/oz. Packet: 25 seeds.
